poem:
Title: "Vignette of a Fractured Dream"

In the morning paper, the tale unfurls,
Striking auto scribes, heartbeats of churned steel,
Actors felled by scripts, nurses, world-healers.
Yet barriers echo in the victorious zeal.
The labor laws, a tarnished awkward wheel.
Momentum on a pendulum, precarious feel,
Under the rising sun, struggle's seal.
